problem_text_cn: 如图,平行四边形ABCD中,E是边BC上的点,AE交BD于点F,如果\frac{BE}{BC}=\frac{2}{3},那么\frac{BF}{FD}的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, E is the vertex on edge BC, and AE intersects BD at vertex F. If \frac {BE}{BC} =\frac{N_0}{N_1}, then the value of \frac {BF}{FD} is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴BC∥AD,BC=AD,∴△BEF∽△DAF,∴BE:DA=BF:DF,∵BC=AD,∴BF:DF=BE:BC=2:3．故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的性质及相似三角形的判定定理和性质．
